title: Establishes no school shall serve as a polling place
summary: Establishes no polling place shall be located on the premises of any public or private elementary or secondary school or a school for preschool children.

       AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to establishing no  school

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-

    6  district, and may contain as many distinctly separate polling places  as
    7  public  convenience  may require. The expense, if any, incidental to its
